author: Toca (tc)
description: This Defold extension allows you to integrate Google's User Messaging Platform (UMP) into your Defold game to manage user consent for ads on Android. It helps you request consent information, show the consent form, and check the user's consent status
name: UMP - Google User Messaging Platform (Android)

releases.message: remove admob id from the manifest to allow to work with the native admob extension for defold
Prevent manifest merging issues, giving priority to the admob extension

Initial Release: This is the first stable version of the UMP Defold Extension, designed to integrate Google’s User Messaging Platform (UMP) for managing user consent for ads in Defold games on Android.

Features:

Easy integration of user consent management for AdMob.
Support for requesting consent information updates.
Methods to check if privacy options are required and to display the privacy options form.
Ability to determine if ads can be requested based on user consent status.
Reset functionality for testing purposes.
Setup Instructions: Add your AdMob App ID in the game project file to initialize the extension.
